basics.name: Danny Tan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am an undergraduate student pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, expecting to graduate in the Fall of 2018.

education.institution: Santa Clara University, Santa Clara, CA

work.summary: Intern working under team of software developers
highlights: Working with a project team responsible for interacting with the client to develop full stack enterprise solutions on real world internal and client projects
Languages and technologies include Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Angular, Vue, and SQL

work.summary: Store supervisor at Volcom Hyatt Waikiki
highlights: Promoted to supervisor after two years as a sales associate
Oversee sales associates and address customer questions/concerns
Prepare and perform for weekly rehearsals and services
Arranged and recorded drum part for an EP Album

awards.title: First Place - Hawaii Annual Code Challenge
awards.summary: Team placed forst overall in Hawaii's largest hackathon to date.

awards.title: Manoa Dean's List
awards.awarder: UH Manoa College of Natural Sciences
awards.summary: Awarded to students who earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade, and do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.

awards.title: Cum Laude Society
awards.summary: Awarded to students in the top 10% of the graduating class.
